install.name: System - Add Print Stylesheet
install.author: Neil Robertson
install.description: Add the CSS file to the [template path]/css folder and enter the file name in the parameter. You could have a different print stylesheet for each installed template if you want but use the same file name e.g. print.css. Remember to enable the plugin.

field.name: css
field.label: CSS File Name
field.description: The file name without the path e.g. print.css
